SQL.LOAD: SELECT credit_card_format_id, credit_card_number, name_on_credit_card, expiration_date, last_4_digits, created_by, created_date, modified_by, modified_date, credit_card_info_id FROM elp_credit_card_info @ SECLINK WHERE credit_card_info_id = :credit_card_info_id
SQL.UPDATE: UPDATE elp_credit_card_info SET credit_card_format_id = :credit_card_format_id, credit_card_number = :credit_card_number, name_on_credit_card = :name_on_credit_card, expiration_date = :expiration_date, last_4_digits = :last_4_digits, modified_by = :modified_by WHERE credit_card_info_id = :credit_card_info_id
SQL.INSERT: INSERT INTO elp_credit_card_info ( credit_card_format_id, credit_card_number, name_on_credit_card, expiration_date, last_4_digits, created_by, credit_card_info_id ) VALUES ( :credit_card_format_id, :credit_card_number, :name_on_credit_card, :expiration_date, :last_4_digits, :created_by, :credit_card_info_id )
